text: Eating Out is an American film series consisting of five LGBT-themed sex comedy films, beginning with Eating Out (2004). The series is distributed by Ariztical Entertainment. Simultaneous filming for Eating Out: Drama Camp and Eating Out: The Open Weekend took place in 2011.Morning Meme: "Waiting Sucks," Especially If You're "Eating Out: The Open Weekend," and Living an "American Horror Story" ==Films== *Eating Out (2004) *Eating Out 2: Sloppy Seconds (2006) *Eating Out: All You Can Eat (2009) *Eating Out: Drama Camp (2011) *Eating Out: The Open Weekend (2011) ==Cast members== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width:99%;" |- ! rowspan="2" style="width:25%;"| Character ! colspan="5" | Film |- ! style="width:15%;"| Eating Out (2004) ! style="width:15%;"| Eating Out 2: Sloppy Seconds (2006) ! style="width:15%;"| Eating Out: All You Can Eat (2009) ! style="width:15%;"| Eating Out: Drama Camp (2011) ! style="width:15%;"| Eating Out: The Open Weekend (2011) |- !
